TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that the user is able to add new validation rule.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on Add New Button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on Add New Button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on Add New Button.

TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to fill in all manadatory fields.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on Save button.
